EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Migrating a Monolith Application To Microservices_AU_Q116.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed: February 8-9
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the two-day workshop on Migrating a Monolith Application to Microservices. See event details below.
Date: 8-9 February 2016 Time: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Location: EMC, Level 29, 570 Bourke St, Melbourne
{{my.Save to Calendar :default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/migrating-to-microservices-workshop/australia]]>.
